core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Industrial Brutalism with Cinematic Elegance.
Emotion First: Every interaction must feel 'heavy' and 'premium'.
Content is King: The video work is the hero; UI is the theater.
Negative Space: Massive margins to let the content breathe.
Anti-Pattern: No generic 'SaaS Blue' gradients. No 'Inter' for headings.

usage_rules.headings: Uppercase, tracking-wide for 'Bebas', tight for 'Anton'. Huge sizes (text-6xl+).

rules: Primary color (Amber) is for CTAs and accents ONLY. Do not overuse.
Use 'diesel_glow' behind hero images or key sections for atmosphere.

buttons.primary: bg-[#F59E0B] text-black font-bold uppercase tracking-wider hover:bg-[#D97706] transition-all duration-300 rounded-none skew-x-[-10deg]
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-white/20 text-white hover:border-[#F59E0B] hover:text-[#F59E0B] transition-all duration-300 uppercase tracking-wider rounded-none

cards.style: bg-[#0A0A0A] border border-white/5 hover:border-[#F59E0B]/50 transition-colors duration-500 group relative overflow-hidden
cards.hover_effect: Scale image slightly (1.05) on hover. Darken overlay.

inputs.style: bg-[#171717] border-white/10 focus:border-[#F59E0B] text-white rounded-none h-12

navigation.style: Fixed top, glassmorphism (bg-black/50 backdrop-blur-md), border-b border-white/5. Logo left, Links right.

assets.icons: Lucide React (Camera, Calendar, Play, Instagram, Menu, X, ChevronRight, MapPin, Mail, Phone)

rules: Hero text should reveal character-by-character or line-by-line.
Images should have a slow parallax effect.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is #EDEDED on dark backgrounds. Use #A1A1AA for secondary text.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible outline in #F59E0B for keyboard navigation.
accessibility.aria_labels: Required for all icon-only buttons (social links, menu).

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. CLEANUP: Remove default App.css styles. Reset body margin.
3. STRUCTURE: Create a LandingPage component and a BookingModal component.
4. ADMIN: Create a simple AdminDashboard component (protected by a simple client-side secret or just hidden route for MVP).
5. BOOKING: Use a custom form with Shadcn UI elements. No backend integration needed yet, just console log or mock success.
6. CRITICAL: Implement the 'Diesel Noir' theme. Dark, grainy, amber accents.
7. IMAGES: Use the provided Unsplash URLs. Do not use placeholders.
universal_guidelines: Do not use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Anton'.
Do not use gradients for text unless it's a very subtle shine.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover states.
